projects.title: Geowisata Lombok
projects.description: Geowisata Lombok is a webGIS website which was originally intended for the local tourism government but stopped due to several reasons. My responsibilities was to prepare the spatial data and set up the Geoserver configuration. Meanwhile, my friend worked on the backend and the frontend.

projects.title: Geosai
projects.description: Geosai is a personal website which I use it to learn new things about spatial stuff. This website has actually been around since 2020 and running under Wordpress engine.

projects.title: Landcover Analysis Using GEE
projects.description: This project was requested by one of my friend. The study area located in Nganjuk Jawa Timur. Using more than 500 sample points, I try to generate landcover using Random Forest Algorythm

projects.title: Automatic Mapping with Python
projects.description: Generate python script for automatic mapping. Taking advantage from scripting, I try to create script that works by exporting a new map from different bookmarks list. Thus I can create many maps in an efficient manner.
